content.html: Slowly but surely learning the difference between a database and an AWS serverless cluster v2. The former holds data, while the latter mainly serves to impress people at tech gatherings. I'm kidding of course. Whoever heard of a tech gathering?!
content.value:
Slowly but surely learning the difference between a database and an AWS serverless cluster v2.

The former holds data, while the latter mainly serves to impress people at tech gatherings.

I'm kidding of course.

Whoever heard of a tech gathering?!
